showerReviews.reviewText: Really clean, well-maintained place (I've been here before), but a one day non-resident pass should not mandate a form including mandatory phone number and email on top of address, and a piece of mail on top of a driver's license. Give me a break, this is a gym, not Fort Knox.

Great gym and pool, clean and well maintained. My mom loves the senior water aerobics class with Terry. Convenient that the library is in the same building. Memberships are a great deal if you go regularly!

The elderly man working the front desk early in the morning of 6/11/25 has earned this facility a one star rating. I believe he said his name was Kent, or Ken. Shockingly rude from the start for no reason. The facility seemed nice and clean …
Enjoy this facility very much. Friendly staff, well maintained equipment and clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: It was my first time at this community center. It was nice, spacious and lots of parking. It was clean, and the staff stayed on their job to make sure everyone parked where they needed to be and where they had to go for their events. If I need to host something, I will be calling them. Thank you.
Very clean, staff very polite nice venue for a family gathering, party or small event
Very clean and the atmosphere was great.

*Nice place
*plenty of room
*very clean
The staff at the center was extremely friendly and helpful.  They provided excellent service and answered all of our needs. The room was clean and the perfect size for our event.

showerReviews.reviewText: Today was my first time using this facility. It was disgusting! the locker room is infested with flying insects and smells horrible. I got into the indoor pool and stepped in what felt like a pile of sand. I cant help but to feel like the …

This is the Dirtiest YMCA I have ever been to! They have great amenities, friendly staff but they need to do a better job of keeping their facility clean! The locker rooms are atrocious!! The same stains, and hairs are in the same place …
They got hit hard by the Tornado that hit St Louis. Being used right now as a staging ground for clean up efforts by ACT STL.

I had fun here. The only complaint is they are not able to completely clean the hot tube and a residue forms on top of the foam in the tube giving you the appearance of the hot tube is not cleaned or an individual/s are not showered before getting in the hot tub. The steam room and the sauna are nicely lit and tempered.
Have a nice clean hall at YMCA.They have swimming gyms exercise classes

I called & asked if the wet area was open & was told it was. Got there & the pool was closed. Cool. The hot tub had an island of foam in the middle & a bunch just floating around (for those that aren’t aware, foam = dirty). This place is definitely is not the cleanest.

I go around 6a. Nobody is there but me, love it! Then pool lady is friendly. The facility has a clean environment. The front desk personnel are pleasant and professional. Much, much better than ten ago.
